name: Psychic Rover
desc: If this card is Special Summoned: You can roll a six-sided die, and if you roll a 1 or 6, destroy up to 2 cards on the field. If this card is sent to the GY: You can roll a six-sided die, and if you roll a 2, 3, 4, or 5, Special Summon this card. The player who Summoned it cannot Special Summon from the Extra Deck, while it is face-up in the Monster Zone.
